verses.verse: Then Zophar <S%H6691><s%> the Naamathite <S%H5284><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%>
"Therefore do my thoughts <S%H5587><s%> give answer <S%H7725><s%> to me, <S%H2363><s%> even by reason of my haste that is in me.
I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the reproof <S%H4148><s%> which puts me to shame. <S%H3639><s%> The spirit <S%H7307><s%> of my understanding <S%H998><s%> answers me. <S%H6030><s%>
Don't <S%H3045><s%> you know this from old <S%H5703><s%> time, <S%H120><s%> since man was placed <S%H7760><s%> on earth, <S%H776><s%>
that the triumphing <S%H7445><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is short, <S%H7138><s%> the joy <S%H8057><s%> of the godless <S%H2611><s%> but for a moment? <S%H7281><s%>
Though his height <S%H7863><s%> mount up <S%H5927><s%> to the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and his head <S%H7218><s%> reach <S%H5060><s%> to the clouds, <S%H5645><s%>
yet he shall perish <S%H6><s%> forever <S%H5331><s%> like his own dung. <S%H1561><s%> Those who have seen <S%H7200><s%> him shall say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H335><s%> 'Where is he?'
He shall fly away <S%H5774><s%> as a dream, <S%H2472><s%> and shall not be found. <S%H4672><s%> Yes, <S%H5074><s%> he shall be chased away like a vision <S%H2384><s%> of the night. <S%H3915><s%>
The eye <S%H5869><s%> which saw <S%H7805><s%> him shall see him no more, <S%H3254><s%> neither shall his place <S%H4725><s%> any more see him. <S%H3254><s%>
His children <S%H1121><s%> shall seek the favor <S%H7521><s%> of the poor. <S%H1800><s%> His hands <S%H3027><s%> shall give back <S%H7725><s%> his wealth. <S%H202><s%>
His bones <S%H6106><s%> are full <S%H4390><s%> of his youth, <S%H5934><s%> but youth shall lie down <S%H7901><s%> with him in the dust. <S%H6083><s%>
"Though wickedness <S%H7451><s%> is sweet <S%H4985><s%> in his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> though he hide <S%H3582><s%> it under his tongue, <S%H3956><s%>
though he spare <S%H2550><s%> it, <S%H5800><s%> and will not let it go, but keep it still <S%H4513><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> his mouth; <S%H2441><s%>
yet his food <S%H3899><s%> in his bowels <S%H4578><s%> is turned. <S%H2015><s%> It is cobra <S%H6620><s%> venom <S%H4846><s%> within him. <S%H7130><s%>
He has swallowed down <S%H1104><s%> riches, <S%H2428><s%> and he shall vomit them up again. <S%H6958><s%> God <S%H410><s%> will cast them out <S%H3423><s%> of his belly. <S%H990><s%>
He shall suck <S%H3243><s%> cobra <S%H6620><s%> venom. <S%H7219><s%> The viper <S%H660><s%>'s tongue <S%H3956><s%> shall kill him. <S%H2026><s%>
He shall not look <S%H7200><s%> at the rivers, <S%H6390><s%> the flowing <S%H5104><s%> streams <S%H6390><s%> of honey <S%H1706><s%> and butter. <S%H2529><s%>

That for which he labored <S%H3022><s%> he shall restore, <S%H7725><s%> and shall not swallow it down. <S%H1104><s%> According to the substance <S%H2428><s%> that he has gotten, <S%H8545><s%> he shall not rejoice. <S%H5965><s%>
For he has oppressed <S%H7533><s%> and forsaken <S%H5800><s%> the poor. <S%H1800><s%> He has violently taken away <S%H1497><s%> a house, <S%H1004><s%> and he shall not build it up. <S%H1129><s%>
"Because he knew <S%H3045><s%> no quietness <S%H7961><s%> within him, <S%H990><s%> he shall not save <S%H4422><s%> anything of that in which he delights. <S%H2530><s%>
There was nothing <S%H400><s%> left <S%H8300><s%> that he didn't <S%H2898><s%> devour, therefore his prosperity shall not endure. <S%H2342><s%>

In the fullness <S%H4390><s%> of his sufficiency, <S%H5607><s%> distress <S%H3334><s%> shall overtake him. <S%H3027><s%> The hand of everyone who is in misery <S%H6001><s%> shall come on him. <S%H935><s%>

When he is about to fill <S%H4390><s%> his belly, <S%H990><s%> God will cast <S%H7971><s%> the fierceness <S%H2740><s%> of his wrath <S%H639><s%> on him. <S%H4305><s%> It will rain on him while he is eating. <S%H3894><s%>
He shall flee <S%H1272><s%> from the iron <S%H1270><s%> weapon. <S%H5402><s%> The bronze <S%H5154><s%> arrow <S%H7198><s%> shall strike him through. <S%H2498><s%>

He draws <S%H8025><s%> it forth, <S%H3318><s%> and it comes out of his body. <S%H1465><s%> Yes, <S%H1300><s%> the glittering point comes out <S%H1980><s%> of his liver. <S%H4846><s%> Terrors are on him. <S%H367><s%>

All darkness <S%H2822><s%> is laid <S%H2934><s%> up for his treasures. <S%H6845><s%> An unfanned <S%H5301><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> him. <S%H3415><s%> It shall consume that which is left <S%H8300><s%> in his tent. <S%H168><s%>
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall reveal <S%H1540><s%> his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%> The earth <S%H776><s%> shall rise up against him. <S%H6965><s%>
The increase <S%H2981><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%> shall depart. <S%H1540><s%> They shall rush away <S%H5064><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his wrath. <S%H639><s%>
This is the portion <S%H2506><s%> of a wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H120><s%> from God, <S%H430><s%> the heritage <S%H5159><s%> appointed <S%H561><s%> to him by God. <S%H410><s%>"
